      • partSearchBoxSelected

        public void partSearchBoxSelected​(javafx.event.ActionEvent searchEvent)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Filters the Parts Table View for Part name or ID. Rubric G: I had trouble getting this to filter properly when I filtered for letters. I realized I needed to add a user input string as the lookupPart parameter. Once I did this (line 142), it worked.
        Parameters:
        searchEvent - Created an Action Event for the search filtering to add to search button
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws IOException if method doesn't work

      • deletePartButtonSelected

        public void deletePartButtonSelected​(javafx.event.ActionEvent deleteEvent)
        Deletes a part from all part list. Also displays a confirmation window prior to deleting item. User must select OK to move forward.
        Parameters:
        deleteEvent - Event being called to delete part. Also triggers confirmation window.

      • deleteProductButtonSelected

        public void deleteProductButtonSelected​(javafx.event.ActionEvent deleteEvent)
        Deletes a product from all product list. Also triggers a confirmation warning prior to deleting item from list. User must select OK to move forward.
        Parameters:
        deleteEvent - Event being called to delete product. Also triggers confirmation window.

      • modifyPartButtonPushed

        public void modifyPartButtonPushed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent modifyEvent)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Switches scenes to the Modify Part Form scene. Also pre-populates the scene with selected part's data.
        Parameters:
        modifyEvent - Event called to switch scenes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws exception if there is an error.

      • modifyProductButtonPushed

        public void modifyProductButtonPushed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent modifyEvent)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Switches scenes to the Modify Product scene. Also populates new scene with selected object's data.
        Parameters:
        modifyEvent - Event created to switch scenes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws IO exception if there is an error.
